name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:

Adept in API development and implementing event-driven patterns to enhance application performance. Experienced in continuous integration and version control, fostering collaboration among teams and prioritizing tasks effectively.
Demonstrated success in delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries, leveraging a diverse tech stack that includes **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Strong background in developing AI/ML-powered platforms, utilizing **FastAPI**, **Django**, and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Proven expertise in compliance-driven development aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, alongside a robust foundation in MLOps with tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
